original_text:
For as the earth brings forth its sprouts,
    and as a garden causes what is sown in it to sprout up,
so the Lord God will cause righteousness and praise
    to sprout up before all the nations.
korean_text: 땅이 싹을 내며 동산이 거기 뿌린 것을 움돋게 함 같이 주 여호와께서 공의와 찬송을 모든 나라 앞에 솟아나게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: For as the earth brings forth its sprouts
and as a garden causes what is sown in it to sprout up
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 정원이 심어진 것을 싹 트게 하는 것 같이

sentences.original_text: so the Lord God will cause righteousness and praise
to sprout up before all the nations.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 민족 앞에서 싹 트게 하시리라
